title: Giro D’Italia Startlist: Roglič, Bernal, Ayuso, Wout Van Aert, Pidcock, Pedersen Headline Glittering Lineup
content:
With the Giro starting next Friday, the entry list for the season’s first Grand Tour is an exciting one.
